entries.meaning: diagonal, in a direction or orientation between cardinal axes
examples: I can see it all now,—the slantwise rain / Of light through the leaves, / The sundown's blaze on her window-pane, / The bloom of her roses under the eaves.

adverbs.description: slantwise (comparative more slantwise, superlative most slantwise)

entries.meaning: diagonally, in a direction or orientation between cardinal axes
examples: […]  he had received a cut slantwise along one temple and cheek, leaving a long scar like a streak of dawn's light falling athwart the dark visage.
